verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
[2x]
We are a chosen generation
We've been called forth to show His excellence
All I require for life, God has given me
And I know who I am

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
[2x]
I know who God says I am
What He says I am
Where He says I'm at
I know who I am

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
[2x]
I'm walking in power,
I'm working miracles
I live a life of favor,
For I know who I am

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh oh oh, oh oh oh
I know who I am
[Repeat]

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I am holy,
I am righteous oh...
I am so rich,
I am beautiful

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
[2x]
I'm walking in power,
I'm working miracles
I live a life of favor,
For I know who I am

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Take a look at me. I'm a wonder
It doesn't matter what you see now
Can you see His glory?
For I know who I am
[Repeat]

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
[2x]
Oh oh oh, oh oh oh
I know who I am
